article.title: The generic fiber of moduli spaces of bounded local $G$-shtukas

multiple_choice_question.text: What is a local G-shtuka over S ∈ NilpFq[[ζ]]?
choices: An isomorphism of associated LG-torsors τ<sub>G</sub>: σ<sup>∗</sup>LG  -> LG.
A pair G = (G, τ<sub>G</sub>) consisting of an L<sup>+</sup>G-torsor G on S and an isomorphism τ<sub>G</sub>: σ<sup>∗</sup>LG  -> LG of the associated LG-torsors.
An isomorphism g: LG\'  -> LG of the associated LG-torsors with g ◦ τ<sub>G′</sub> = τ<sub>G</sub> ◦ σ<sup>∗</sup>g.

multiple_choice_question.text: What does the functor Fℓ<sub>G</sub> on NilpFq[[ζ]] represent?
choices: Isomorphism classes of L<sup>+</sup>G-torsors on S.
Isomorphism classes of LG-torsors on S.
Isomorphism classes of pairs (G, δ) where G is an L<sup>+</sup>G-torsor on S and δ: LG  -> LG<sub>S</sub> is an isomorphism of the associated LG-torsors.
Isomorphism classes of pairs (G, τ<sub>G</sub>) where G is an L<sup>+</sup>G-torsor on S and τ<sub>G</sub>: σ<sup>∗</sup>LG  -> LG is an isomorphism of the associated LG-torsors.

multiple_choice_question.text: What is the condition for an S-valued point to belong to the closed ind-subscheme Fℓ<sub>SLr</sub><sup>(n)</sup> of Fℓ<sub>SLr</sub>?
choices: For all j = 1, . . . , r,  <sup>j</sup>O<sub>S</sub>[[z]] M(δ)  ⊂ (z − ζ)<sup>n(j/2−jr)</sup> ⋅  <sup>j</sup>O<sub>S</sub>[[z]] M(L<sup>+</sup><sub>SLr</sub>)<sub>S</sub>.
For all j = 1, . . . , r,  <sup>j</sup>O<sub>S</sub>[[z]] M(δ) = (z − ζ)<sup>n(j/2−jr)</sup> ⋅  <sup>j</sup>O<sub>S</sub>[[z]] M(L<sup>+</sup><sub>SLr</sub>)<sub>S</sub>.

multiple_choice_question.text: What is the presheaf associated with the affine Grassmannian Gr<sup>BdR</sup><sub>G</sub>?
